title: One Piece Episode #528 Anime Review
author: Chris Beveridge
description: A contemporary review of Episode 528 published on the same day it aired in Japan. The reviewer discusses Sanji's explosive nosebleed condition and how racism plays a role in the episode's conflict.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Review focused only on Episode 528 content

title: One Piece – Fishman Island Arc (Episodes 523 – 538) Review
author: Hogan Reviews
description: A comprehensive review of the first portion of the Fishman Island Arc, covering episodes 523-538, which includes Episode 528. The review examines the arc's themes, pacing, and key moments.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for episodes 523-538 of the Fishman Island Arc

title: One Piece: Fishman Island (517-574) Episode 528 - Excitement Blow-out! Sanji's Life Under Threat!
author: Toei Animation
description: Official streaming of Episode 528 on Crunchyroll, available with English subtitles. The episode shows Sanji's near-fatal nosebleed at Mermaid Cove and the revelation of Fish-Man Island's blood donation prohibition.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Official episode stream, no additional spoilers

title: One Piece with a Lime - One Piece Eps 528-533
author: One Piece with a Lime Podcast
description: A podcast episode covering One Piece episodes 528-533, discussing the events at Mermaid Cove, Sanji's medical crisis, and the introduction of the Neptune Brothers.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains discussion and spoilers for episodes 528-533

title: One Piece Ep 528 Excitement Blow Out Sanji Life Under Threat on Toonami
author: JCR Comic Arts
description: A blog post covering Episode 528's Toonami broadcast, discussing the episode's significance and key moments during its North American television premiere.

title: Sanji Nosebleed Ep 528 - TikTok Compilation
author: Various TikTok Creators
description: A collection of TikTok videos featuring clips, memes, and discussions about Sanji's iconic massive nosebleed from Episode 528. Fans discuss how the scene would look in a potential Fishman Island remake with modern animation quality.

title: One Piece – 528
author: Anivision
description: A review and discussion of Episode 528 published shortly after its original air date, providing contemporary analysis of the episode's events.

title: Sunny Go One Piece Podcast - Episode 206: Fishman Island Arc Review
author: Sunny Go Podcast
description: A comprehensive review of the entire Fishman Island Arc, including discussion of Episode 528's important moments like Sanji's medical emergency and the Neptune Brothers' introduction.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Fishman Island Arc (episodes 517-574)
